::: {.tabdiv}

```{r}
# Load/set options ----
# Load metrics options
metrics_options <- c("Select a metric" = "", "Richness" = "richness", "LCBD" = "lcbd")

# Add selectors ----
# Filter selector
selectInput(
   inputId = "diversitySelect",
   label = "Select metric", 
   choices = metrics_options
)

selectInput(
   inputId = "diversityGroup",
   label = "Select level", 
   choices = c("Select one" = "")
)

# Add contextual information ----
tags$div(
  id = "diversity_title",
  class = "rtitle_class",
  textOutput("selectedMetric"),
  style = "font-style: normal !important;"
)

tags$div(
  id = "context_info_div",
  class = "context_info",
  textOutput("contextMetric"), htmltools::br()
)

conditionalPanel("input.diversitySelect == 'richness' && input.diversityMode != 'raw'",
tags$div(
  id = "scenario_box_diversity",
  class = "scenario_class",
      selectInput(
        inputId = "diversityType",
        label = "Threshold",
        choices = c("P10" = "p10", "Sens+Spec" = "mss")
      ))
)

conditionalPanel("input.diversitySelect == 'richness' && input.diversityMode != 'raw'",
tags$div(
  id = "scenario_box_diversity2",
  class = "scenario_class",
      selectInput(
        inputId = "diversityPostTreat",
        label = "Post-treatment",
        choices = c("Standard" = "std", "Constrained" = "const")
      ))
)
```
